**Summary**
• Bitcoin’s price is tied to bond yields, especially the 10-year Treasury.
• A spike in yields could mean BTC is about to moonshot.
• Watch the bond market; it’s your cheat code for crypto gains.

Impact — Bitcoin’s next big move hinges on what happens in the bond market, so pay attention or miss out.
